DOC.brief_summary: Dopamine receptor occupancy and brain metabolism were measured using positron emission tomography after the administration of aripiprazole. Working memory performance was also measured using N-back task. The investigators explored the relationship between changes in brain metabolism and working memory performance.
DOC.brief_title: Change in Brain Metabolism and Cognitive Function by Aripiprazole
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers righthanded any significant abnormality on routine lab any psychiatric disease
